events.name: eds-indicator-canceled
events.description: Fired when indicator cancel button is clicked

events.name: eds-indicator-paused
events.description: Fired when indicator pause button is clicked

events.name: eds-indicator-played
events.description: Fired when indicator play button is clicked

properties.name: indicatorType
properties.description: Select Linear Bar or Circular type of indicator

properties.name: labelPrimary
properties.description: Primary label that will display above progress indicator bar

properties.name: labelSecondary
properties.description: Secondary label that will display above progress indicator bar (linear only)

properties.name: progressLabel
properties.description: Progress label percentage will show in the middle of circular indicator (circular only)

EDSIndicator.description: Progress Indicators are used to show the completion status of an operation.
EDSIndicator.name: Indicator
EDSIndicator.usage:
The following css variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-indicator-element | Coloring the progress bar iteself
--eds-indicator-value | Coloring the value bar inside the progress element
--eds-indicator-label | Text label color
--eds-indicator-button | Cancel button color
--eds-indicator-circular-inner-fill | Circular indicator inner circle fill
--eds-indicator-circular-ring-fill | Circular indicator ring fill
--eds-indicator-circular-segment-fill | Circular indicator segment fill

events.name: eds-indicator-canceled
events.description: Fired when indicator cancel button is clicked

events.name: eds-indicator-paused
events.description: Fired when indicator pause button is clicked

events.name: eds-indicator-played
events.description: Fired when indicator play button is clicked
